author: bmwlego
title: Printed Parts on a Racers Tiny Turbo!
review:
This Monster Crusher is OK. I bought it on clearance with the rest of the series once it was on clearance. The colors are different (dark stone) and most of the designs you see on the bricks are printed! The stickers are few with this set. I forgot that this set had printed parts and before I reviewed it I researched it on peeron and was surprised to see printed parts. The printed parts add to the look of the car, unlike the Street Maniac (8644), whose printed parts and stickers are in abundance.
The large tires are not bad but the dark gray wheels are great. There are a lot of cool parts included with this set (wedge plate for windshield, mudguards, silver handlebars, sloped bricks, etc). The overall look of the car is OK.

Check out my Racers folder on my Brickshelf Gallery:
http://brickset.com/reviews/post.aspx?SetID=4615

author: Gus_263
title: Well designed, well detailed
review: This is a good tiny turbo set, without any place for the minifigure, but still cool, playable and useful with these contents. The colors, basically red, grey, and black have too other colors in few parts. The wheels are greater than others from the same subtheme, making this looks like with a big off road car. The design is cool, altough with big(for tiny turbos) wheels, this have ramp shaped pieces, like the gray next to the black glass, and others on it's back. The grey pieces at the sides of the front are well made, and good positioned to the red(don't crimsom) pieces on the front. One of these can be connected with claw pieces, and back of this could have a grey plate above the grey pieces. But, also this and the printed details(that completes the design for the set) aren't cons, and the rate keeps deserving a good one. The playability is good, due to the size is easy make a race with two or three of these cars or make tricks with one. This set, "Monster Crusher" deserves a 5/5 rate. Good Job, lego!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Racers (Tiny Turbos) - Monster Crusher Review
review:
This set is a really nice little set to have and fun to play with as well. It's a nice and simple build and we also don't get any stickers to worry about. This little vehicle is very easy to maneuver, too. I also like the design of this car and it's a great small set to have for sure. It's also a great set which you can use for pieces which you can use for your future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms. It's a good set to have for sure but I would recommend you to get the bigger sets first before you get this one.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
